# <a name="permanently-delete-email"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f436-102">Trajno brisanje e-pošte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f436-102">Permanently delete email</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f436-103">Ako želite da izbrišete e-pošte ili da ispraznite prijemno:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f436-103">If you want to delete email or empty your inbox:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="4f436-104">Izaberite poruke koje želite da izbrišete (ili izaberite krug</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f436-104">Select the messages you want to delete (or select the circle</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="4f436-105">"dalje" u **poštanskom sandučetu** na vrhu liste poruka da biste izabrali sve poruke u prijemnom).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f436-105">next to **Inbox** at the top of your message list to select all messages in your inbox).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="4f436-106">Na vrhu stranice, izaberite stavku **Izbriši** (za celu fasciklu **praznu fasciklu**ili **Prazna fokusiran** / **drugom isprazni** ako imate fokusirana prijemnog omogućen).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f436-106">At the top of the page, select **Delete** (for the whole folder **Empty folder**, or **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** if you have Focused Inbox enabled).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="4f436-107">Da Očisti izbrisane e-mail, otvorite [fasciklu "Izbrisane stavke"](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) i izaberite **praznu fasciklu**, zatim izaberite **spasen stavke** na vrhu stranice i izaberite **praznu fasciklu** ponovo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f436-107">To purge all your deleted email, open your [Deleted Items folder](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) and select **Empty folder**, then select **Recoverable items** at the top of the page and select **Empty folder** again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f436-108">Da biste saznali više, pročitajte [Brisanje e-pošte na Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f436-108">To learn more, read [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
